data.name: Minecraft Dungeons Hero DLC
data.detailed_description:
Includes a Hero Cape, two player skins, and a chicken pet.
Only for the Minecraft Dungeons Ultimate Edition Bundle or Minecraft Dungeons Ultimate DLC bundle
data.about_the_game:
Includes a Hero Cape, two player skins, and a chicken pet.
Only for the Minecraft Dungeons Ultimate Edition Bundle or Minecraft Dungeons Ultimate DLC bundle
data.short_description: Includes a Hero Cape, two player skins, and a chicken pet.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Traditional Chinese*, Portuguese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (November 2019 Update or higher), 8 or 7 (64-bit with the latest updates; some functionality not supported on Windows 7 and 8)
  • Processor: Core i5 2.8GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 or equivalent DX11 GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Performance increases with higher-end systems. Not supported on Windows 10S.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (November 2019 Update or higher), 8 or 7 (64-bit with the latest updates; some functionality not supported on Windows 7 and 8)
  • Processor: Core i5 2.8GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 or equivalent DX11 GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Performance increases with higher-end systems. Not supported on Windows 10S.
